pages.text: An incredibly strong metal forged from the crude steel iron alloy, infused with dragon blood, and forged through the breath of an active, living dragon in an appropriately constructed dragon forge.

There are 2 variants of this dragonsteel:$(br)fire dragonsteel and ice dragonsteel.$(br2)Each are appropriately made in their own unique dragon forges which also need to be powered by their corresponding dragon variant.
